title: Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 2nd day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 
2024) shall come into operation: 

sections 1 to 5; 

(a) 
(b) Part 26. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 November, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [662] 3
